name: Neverending parkour
description:
This game is a classic parkour game with basic movements and jumping and shooting, made in less than 7 days. Made specifically for the 7dfps GameJams (2022) with the goal of understanding any issues players may encounter in my game and how I can improve my video game development skills.

        The UI design is basic, the way to shoot is simple and maybe a bit boring, but in general I tried to give the players a pleasant state after the game. The game offers the possibility to change the sensitivity of the mouse in order not to create discomfort during the game.

        If you liked the game, then you can follow me both on my itch.io page and on Instagram. Link to my itch.io page:  https://andyandrewentertainment.itch.io/

        I hope you like the game!

Here are the controls :

W,A,S,D - Movement

E - Interaction with objects

Mouse left click - to shoot

P - pause menu

Neverending parkour_Ver.2.4 :

What is new :

(*) Other small bugs fixed and small optimizations were implemented in the game
